caption.p: Anxiolytic activity of MEHA on hole board test in mice. Results are expressed in mean ± SEM. ** p < 0.01 and *** p < 0.001, significantly different from control; ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s test ( n = 3, per group). MEHA: methanol extract of Homalomena aromatica leaves (200 mg/kg and 400 mg/kg); Reference drug diazepam 1 mg/kg.
